# Government Tender Announcement

## Procurement Title
 Temporary Help Services (THS) - Special Advisor

## Reference Number
24-250608

## Solicitation Date
2023-10-13

## Closing Date
2023-10-20 14:00:00 (EST)

## Procurement Notice
The Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development has issued a request for proposal for the provision of Temporary Help Services (THS) - Special Advisor under the designated Supply Arrangement.

## Brief Description
The Department requires one (1) Special Advisor to support the workload of the Director General's (DG) office and provide direct support to the DG. The successful candidate will be responsible for:

- Providing advice and guidance on the development and implementation of the Grants and Contributions (Gs&Cs) Transformation initiative
- Reviewing and providing advice on bureau direction, planning, and performance
- Advising and developing documentation to communicate effectively to various audiences
- Supporting the DG in engagement with key interlocutors
- Identifying and developing approaches and procedures to deliver on the bureau's mandate
- Reviewing documents on current and emerging issues for consistency with departmental and Bureau positions

## Security Requirements
Common PS SRCL #34 applies, with a minimum corporate security requirement of SECRET and a minimum resource security requirement of SECRET.

## Tendering Procedure
This procurement is open only to holders of the Temporary Help Services (THS) Supply Arrangement who have qualified and are currently holding active contracts for services in the National Capital Region for the following categories:

- Performance and Technical Category
- Special Advisor (Stream 13—Policy and Advisory Services)

## Eligible Contractors
The following Special Advisor holders have been invited to submit a proposal:

- 1019837 Ontario Inc.
- ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp.
- Altis Recruitment & Technology Inc.

## Contact Information
For inquiries regarding this request for proposal, please contact:

- Muna Sayid, Contracting Authority
- Email: muna.sayid@international.gc.ca
- Phone: (343) 203-6382

## Important Notes
Please note that the distribution of the solicitation documents does not rely on BuyAndSell.GC.CA. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language.
